channel.title: Sec3d
channel.description: Building applications, securing infrastructure and applications, and everything in-between.

item.title: Sigstore - Signature Sorcery
item.description: Sigstore is an open source project enabling anyone to sign and validate software releases, including container images. This article takes a closer look at Sigstore and some of the innovation happening around the project.
item.author: dev@stb.id.au (Shane Boulden)
